alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northwestern Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hawthorne to Citra to near Williston Municipal Airport. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Lakes Estates, Fort McCoy, Citra, Hawthorne, Sparr, Anthony, Cross Creek, Orange Springs, Reddick and McIntosh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
